articles.title: After nine years with Celtics, Marcus Smart is ‘excited and proud’ to be a Laker
articles.description:
"It was weird at first. ... I definitely didn't think that would be a possibility but I'm enjoying every last bit of it."

The post After nine years with Celtics, Marcus Smart is ‘excited and proud’ to be a Laker appeared first on Boston.com.
